Text.Page: Many of the miners caught the plague. With some tissue samples from the mutated survivors, one could determine more about the origins of this disease. In the process, you might put some of those {@LinkCreature:40#16#mutant miners} out of their misery.
I'll work night and day to make sense of this. Thank you, <PCNAME>.
When I have the samples from those {@LinkCreature:40#16#mutant miners} I can begin my work. For now, my hands are tied.
